LanguageData.TheRimWorldDefault: Item quality is determined by the default RimWorld algorithm.
LanguageData.ItemQualityIs: Item quality is based purely on Pawn skill level.
LanguageData.ItemQualityIs1: Item quality is based on Pawn skill level +/- 1 quality level.
LanguageData.ItemQualityIs2: Item quality is based on Pawn skill level +/- 2 quality levels.
LanguageData.CraftingEnabled: Whether or not crafting notifications on Masterwork/Legendary items is enabled.
LanguageData.LegendaryWithInspirationEnabled: Whether or not Legendary items can only be created with inspiration.
